item.description: Damien (@damienomurchu) is a software engineer at Red Hat with a passion for developing applications. After a wayward path involving spells in business and analysis he finally returned to code again many years ago and could not be happier. A self-taught programmer and auto-didactic in nature he holds degrees in computer science and business, and is presently pursuing a masters degree in computer science. He is also an active and enthusiastic participant in outreach and educational programmes as a mentor and a teacher.
Resources General list of software development resources related to software development. Books Blogs Sites
